panel__content__task__edit__destination_.message: Modify task or files download settings

panel__content__task__edit__priority__su.message: The priority in which to allocate bandwidth.

panel__content__task__edit__max_peers__s.message: The maximum of peers allowed per torrent file.

panel__content__task__edit__max_download.message: The maximum download rate (default to 0, which means unlimited).

panel__content__task__edit__max_upload_r.message: The maximum upload rate (default to 0, which means unlimited).

panel__content__task__edit__seeding_inte.message: The amount of Seeding time to reach before completing task (in minutes, 0 means none, -1 means infinite).

panel__content__task__edit__seeding_rati.message: The Share ratio to reach before completing task (in %, 0 means none).

panel__content__task__edit__seeding_info.message: This task automatically stop seeding when both conditions below are satisfied. Set the share ratio and seeding time to '0' to stop seeding immediately when download finishes
